name: Chibi Avatar
description:
Chibi avatar lets you create your own avatar chibi with the manga style. Make a xiibi is simple and only takes two minutes:
- Select your chibi sex.
- Customize your chibi. The possibilities are unlimited: change the eyes, the hair, the nose, the ears, the face, the eyebrows, the body ... and also you can colour each part of your character as you like.
- When your chibi is ready, take a picture of it for share this with your friends.

*Pictures are saved in the images folder Xiibis of your device.

There are more than 300 different character for play.
